== Thomas Laube aka tomtomtom ==
I am 28 years old and live in Berlin. I use ubuntu sinces Dapper (after using SuSE and Debian before).

Also I am involved in <nowiki>[[http:ubuntu-berlin.de|Ubuntu Berlin]]</nowiki>, a local ubuntu usergroup.

I am a member of the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-de-locoteam |German Ubuntu LoCo Team]]</nowiki> especially

* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-de-events|the german event team]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntuusers.de|the team of the official german user support forum]]</nowiki>

=== Ubuntu related activites ===
* involved in the Lucid Lynx Releaseparty of <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu-berlin.de|Ubuntu Berlin]]</nowiki>
* supporter at <nowiki>[[http://forum.ubuntuusers.de|the official german user support forum]]</nowiki> since June 2010
* presenting Ubuntu at <nowiki>[[http://linuxtag.de|LinuxTag Berlin]]</nowiki> 2010
* speaker at german <nowiki>[[http://www.ubucon.de|Ubucon]]</nowiki> in October 2010 
* involved in Maverick Meerkat Releaseparty of <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu-berlin.de|Ubuntu Berlin]]</nowiki>
* presenting Ubuntu at <nowiki>[[http://blit.org|BLIT]]</nowiki> 
* speaker at <nowiki>[[http://blit.org|BLIT]]</nowiki>
* presenting Ubuntu at <nowiki>[[http://http://chemnitzer.linux-tage.de/2011|Chemnitzer LinuxTage 2011]]</nowiki>
* presenting Ubuntu at <nowiki>[[http://linuxtag.de|LinuxTag Berlin 2011]]</nowiki>
* involved in Natty Narwhal Releaseparty of <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu-berlin.de|Ubuntu Berlin]]</nowiki>
* speaker at <nowiki>[[http://blit.org|BLIT 2011]]</nowiki>, a regional fair in Potsdam

=== Vision ===
My vision is to get more users for Ubuntu by presenting and explaining at fairs and local events and continue and expand community user support.
